insert into dms_storage_area ( storage_type,storage_code,dms_site_code,dms_site_name, des_province_code,des_province_name,des_city_code,des_city_name,create_user_code, create_user_name,create_time,update_time,update_user_name ) values
( #{item.storageType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{item.storageCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dmsSiteCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.dmsSiteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.desProvinceCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.desProvinceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.desCityCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.desCityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createUserCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), now(), #{item.updateUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update:
update dms_storage_area
storage_type = #{storageType,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
storage_code = #{storageCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dms_site_code = #{dmsSiteCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dms_site_name = #{dmsSiteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
des_province_code = #{desProvinceCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
des_province_name = #{desProvinceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
des_city_code = #{desCityCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
des_city_name = #{desCityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_user_code = #{createUserCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_user_name = #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user_name = #{updateUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

from dms_storage_area where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by ts desc limit 1
